$ gocdk help serve
TODO more about serve

Usage:
  gocdk serve [flags]

Flags:
      --address host:port        host:port address to serve on (default "localhost:8080")
      --biome name               name of biome to apply and use configuration from (default "dev")
  -h, --help                     help for serve
      --poll-interval duration   time between checking project directory for changes (default 500ms)

$ gocdk serve -h
TODO more about serve

Usage:
  gocdk serve [flags]

Flags:
      --address host:port        host:port address to serve on (default "localhost:8080")
      --biome name               name of biome to apply and use configuration from (default "dev")
  -h, --help                     help for serve
      --poll-interval duration   time between checking project directory for changes (default 500ms)

$ gocdk serve --help
TODO more about serve

Usage:
  gocdk serve [flags]

Flags:
      --address host:port        host:port address to serve on (default "localhost:8080")
      --biome name               name of biome to apply and use configuration from (default "dev")
  -h, --help                     help for serve
      --poll-interval duration   time between checking project directory for changes (default 500ms)
